checks

checks de.unkrig: Wrap class

Verifies that class declarations are uniformly wrapped and indented.

    • Property Summary

      Properties 
      Property Name and Description
      allowOneLineDecl
      Whether to allow a complete class declaration in one single line.
      wrapDeclBeforeClass
      Whether to wrap class declarations before the CLASS keyword.
      wrapDeclBeforeLCurly
      Whether to wrap class declarations before the opening curly brace.

    • Property Detail

      • allowOneLineDecl

        Whether to allow a complete class declaration in one single line. Example: 
        public class Pojo { int fld; }

      • wrapDeclBeforeClass

        Whether to wrap class declarations before the CLASS keyword. Example: 
        public static final
class MyClass {

      • wrapDeclBeforeLCurly

        Whether to wrap class declarations before the opening curly brace. Example: 
        public class MyClass
{
